name: Greek Mythological Geneology Quiz | Greek Myth | 5 Questions

questions.text: Which of these individuals was not a descendant of Gaea?
questions.explanation:
Chaos.

	Chaos was there in the beginning, prior to the birth of mother earth.

questions.text: Who was Athena's grandmother (on her father's side)?
Who was the great great grandmother of the Hydra?
questions.explanation:
Medusa.

	On his mother's (Echidne) father's (Chrysaor) side! Medusa was the progenitor of a gaggle of monsters.

questions.text: Which of these wasn't a grandchild of Uranus?
questions.explanation:
Hermes.

	Hermes was a great great grandchild or a great grandchild, depending on which parent you look at...there was a lot of incest going on there you must understand!

questions.text: Who was the grandmother of Dionysius on his mother's side?
questions.explanation:
Harmonia.

	Harmonia was his grandmother on his mother's side, having given birth to Semele with King Cadmus. Semele bore her child Dionysius with Zeus.  Confusing?  Thank you for playing the quiz!
